body:
@tgamblin 

### Expected Result

I expected to successfully install Dakota version 6.3

### Actual Result

The build failed with the following error message:
```
/path/to/dakota/packages/motif/src/Graphics.C(68): error: identifier "CreateMenuBar" is undefined
/path/to/dakota/packages/motif/src/Graphics.C(69): error: identifier "CreateMenu" is undefined
/path/to/dakota/packages/motif/src/Graphics.C(76): error: identifier "CreateMenuChoice" is undefined
```
when building packages/motif/CMakeFiles/DGraphics.dir/src/Graphics.C.o

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
./spack install --keep-stage -v dakota
```

### Information on your system

I am using the Intel 18.0.0 compiler with intel-parallel-studio@cluster.2018.0.
title: Dakota 6.3 fails to install due to undefined identifiers
